publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3543.3 Tommy Sheridan: Quality of Life-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3543) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, leave out from "supports" to end and insert "believes that the quality of life in Scotland's communities would be best improved by abolishing the regressive council tax and introducing a Scottish Service Tax, which would redistribute income to the less well-off and fund local services more effectively."
